conclusion: Understand relationship between light source, objects, and shadows
Light source is at the top of the image, casting shadows on the ground
Objects labeled A, B, C, and D are on the ground
Shadows cast by objects will change when light source moves
Shadows will shift to new positions when light source moves
Shadow of cake will shift to a new position when light source moves
Object B is a red cross symbol
Shadow of red cross symbol will remain in the same position
Object C is a roll of paper towels
Shadow of paper towels will remain in the same position
Shadow of ring will remain in the same position
Shadows will shift to new positions when light source moves to back right
Shadow of cake will move to back right, others remain in same position
